Locale.Value:
- The whiteboard now supports Excalidraw cards
- Add undo and redo buttons to the toolbar at the top of the editor
- The rules for one-click formatting have added the option to replace half-width commas and periods with full-width ones
- Fixed the problem that the word count of sub-documents and directory details was not updated in some cases
- Fixed some issues with find and replace operations
- Fixed some chapter splitting and merging problems
- Some minor improvements and bug fixes

- 白板中现在支持添加 Excalidraw 画板
- 编辑器顶部工具栏增加撤销、重做按钮
- 一键排版增加将半角逗号、句号替换为全角的选项
- 修复一些情况下子文档、目录详情字数统计没有更新的问题
- 修复了一些查找替换操作的问题
- 修复了一些章节切分与合并操作的问题
- 一些细节完善以及小问题修复
